## Education & Parenthood

![Original](xkl4nb0bo6qd1.png)

```{r}
"
sex,   children,  education,      percent,
Men,   Parent,    College Degree, 36,
Men,   Childless, College Degree, 35,
Men,   Parent,    No College,     39,
Men,   Childless, No College,     38,
Men,   Parent,    Some College,   24,
Men,   Childless, Some College,   27,
Women, Parent,    College Degree, 31,
Women, Childless, College Degree, 47,
Women, Parent,    No College,     27,
Women, Childless, No College,     27,
Women, Parent,    Some College,   28,
Women, Childless, Some College,   26
" |>
  read_csv(col_types = "fff") |>
  mutate(
    education = fct_relevel(education, "No College", "Some College", "College Degree")) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = children, y = education, fill = percent)) +
  geom_tile() +
  geom_text(aes(label = percent), size = 5, colour = "white") +
  scale_y_discrete(position = "right") +
  coord_fixed() +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sex)) +
  labs(
    title = "Education negatively correlated with motherhood, but not fatherhood",
    subtitle = "Percent of Americans over 50 by education level and parenthood status",
    caption = "Source: Pew Research Center, \"The Experiences of U.S. Adults Who Don't Have Children,\" 2021-22") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(face = "italic", colour = "grey20"),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 14),
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_text(size = 14),
    panel.grid = element_blank())
```
